text: The Belarusian Figure Skating Championships are the annual figure skating national championships of Belarus. Medals may be awarded in the disciplines of men's singles, ladies' singles, pair skating, and ice dancing, across different levels. Not every event has been held in every year due to a lack of entries. Orthography of competitors' names may vary in different sources. This article uses ISU spelling. ==Senior medalists== ===Men=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Season !
